verses.text: And it came to pass the same year , in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah , in the fourth year , \add and\add* in the fifth month , \add that\add* Hananiah the son of Azur the prophet , which \add was\add* of Gibeon , spake unto me in the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in the presence of the priests and of all the people , saying ,
Thus speaketh the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel , saying , I have broken the yoke of the king of Babylon.

Within two full years will I bring again into this place all the vessels of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* house , that Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon took away from this place , and carried them to Babylon :\f + \fr 28.3 \ft two…: Heb. two years of days\f*

And I will bring again to this place Jeconiah the son of Jehoiakim king of Judah , with all the captives of Judah , that went into Babylon , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for I will break the yoke of the king of Babylon.\f + \fr 28.4 \ft captives: Heb. captivity\f* \p
¶ Then the prophet Jeremiah said unto the prophet Hananiah in the presence of the priests , and in the presence of all the people that stood in the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*,

Even the prophet Jeremiah said , Amen : the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* do so: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* perform thy words which thou hast prophesied , to bring again the vessels of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* house , and all that is carried away captive , from Babylon into this place.
Nevertheless hear thou now this word that I speak in thine ears , and in the ears of all the people ;
The prophets that have been before me and before thee of old prophesied both against many countries , and against great kingdoms , of war , and of evil , and of pestilence.

The prophet which prophesieth of peace , when the word of the prophet shall come to pass , \add \+w then|strong="H0227"\+w*\add* shall the prophet be known , that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath truly sent him. \p
¶ Then Hananiah the prophet took the yoke from off the prophet Jeremiah’s neck , and brake it.

And Hananiah spake in the presence of all the people , saying , Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Even so will I break the yoke of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon from the neck of all nations within the space of two full years. And the prophet Jeremiah went his way. \p

¶ Then the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto Jeremiah \add the prophet\add*, after that Hananiah the prophet had broken the yoke from off the neck of the prophet Jeremiah , saying ,
Go and tell Hananiah , saying , Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Thou hast broken the yokes of wood ; but thou shalt make for them yokes of iron.

For thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel ; I have put a yoke of iron upon the neck of all these nations , that they may serve Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon ; and they shall serve him: and I have given him the beasts of the field also. \p
¶ Then said the prophet Jeremiah unto Hananiah the prophet , Hear now, Hananiah ; The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not sent thee; but thou makest this people to trust in a lie.

Therefore thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Behold, I will cast thee from off the face of the earth : this year thou shalt die , because thou hast taught rebellion against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 28.16  t rebellion: Heb. revolt *
So Hananiah the prophet died the same year in the seventh month.
